metadata.description: DNS event fields for S1QL 2.0 queries

fields.description: The protocol used in the DNS request
The provider used by the agent to collect the DNS event telemetry
Domain name of the resource requested by the host
The data in the DNS response describing the resource. I.e. the IP address, DNS, type, and so on.
The DNS response code returned by the DNS server
The transport protocol used in the DNS request
